You know, not that many people appreciate reading a childish 
arguement over a list that is -meant- to be for an RPG's, for crying 
out loud. Next time - keep your petty insults to yourselves, please? 
*rolls eyes*

>  Here is the complete convo, for anyone who really cares. I think 
its pretty 
> funny. -jp
> 
> 
>

sentence.

writing some

dont know
